attributes.title: Not user friendly
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it was extremely difficult to use and not user friendly at all. The app would force close after 5 seconds and is poorly engineered

attributes.title: So awful
attributes.review: This app has to be the worst app in the entire world. Not only was it paid for and endorsed by a CHEETO it’s also incredibly ugly and SLOW. It took 3 weeks to download but luckily only 3 seconds to delete 🥰😘😌 I would never recommend this trash app to anyone I loved

attributes.title: Please...help me
attributes.review: I’m trapped. The app won’t close, it keeps flashing off then on. Every time I go to text someone, to google something..,.HES THERE. His face, his orange ness it’s too much for me. Don’t download this app unless you know what you are getting into. He is orange, he is risen. Tell my family I love them .

attributes.title: Rating
attributes.review: I would rate this a zero if i could the app is very very glitchy and very difficult to use. First this app to a very long time to download and second of all it is NOT worth your time. The app is horrible and is not worth it at all.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD FELLOW TRUMP SUPPORTERS
attributes.review: Not only did this app’s download take 13 Hours, I was DISGuSTED when I saw what was in its contents. When I opened the app, I expected to be able to SUPPORT MY PRESIDENT 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 INSTEAD, I was greeted with only some strange Japanese videos, all of which were VERY not Christian. I wish I could give it 0 stars!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible quality
attributes.review: Ignoring the fact that Trump himself has said and done some...terrible things in his lifetime, the app itself is horrible quality and I do not recommend it to anyone. 1 star because it’s Trump and the quality of this app is revolting.

attributes.title: Worst game ever
attributes.review: This game is terrible and very boring once I opened the app I saw a huge orange. Probably one of the biggest oranges I’ve ever seen. I showed this app to my grandma and she fainted so I had to call life support. You should be ashamed of yourself and I’m not voting for you. Your not invited to my grandma’s funeral.

attributes.title: DIARRHEA (a big mess)
attributes.review: This app is so scary when I opened it I saw a picture of a naked Cheeto and I was horrified it also caused my grandson Ricky to have uncontrollable diarrhea and it got all over my mother-in-law’s badonkadonks and that is the most truly worst day in my life and it was all because of this app and truly big booty!!

attributes.title: disappointed:(
attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app because i wanted to support our great president! but my phone gave me a notification as i open the app saying: this app is too racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, and too reliant on belief instead of fact to function properly on this device. i truly have no words; i feel almost as screwed over as all of the underage kids that our great president had sex with 🥰 wish i could give it zero stars but it is what it is 😔🤟

attributes.title: NO JUST NO
attributes.review: I’m “not” apart of removing this app but I downloaded it to see some things abt how it works.. it keeps crashing my phone so I can’t even get into it! Even when I get in it for 3 minutes it goes all black?! I’m so mad I wasted me storage getting this app.. -delete-
